title: I joined a band 3 months before leaving Chicago
snippet:
I joined a band 3 months before I left Chicago. My buddy, Charles, asked me if I'd be down to learn and record live performances of four songs with us and his two friends, Joe and James.

Of course, I get to join a fun band with great musicians and even...

title: Nothing's scarier than silence in We're All Going to the World's Fair
snippet:
It’s so trite. I shouldn’t even write it.

Okay, fine:

We’ve never been more connected. We’ve never been more alone.

What else is there to even say about the horrors of this, the defining paradox of modern life? Well—according to We’re All...

title: A Cross on a Gravel Road (Music Video)
snippet:
Hi, friends.

I hope you’re finding new tunes (and perhaps old faves) with which to romanticize your walks and drives this fall. If you’re looking for recommendations, I can offer you one at great length.

I’m kicking off spooky season with...

title: Mike Viola’s “Paul McCarthy” is an open love letter to classic rock
snippet:
Mike Viola has a problem.

He’s admitted it, on record, twice now.

The man cannot stop drowning in electric guitars and classic rock.

As he did on 2018’s The American Egypt and 2020’s *Godmuffin, *Viola borrows gleefully from the golden eras of...

title: Operation Route 66
snippet:
Listen to Operation Route 66: Original Score

A 12-track album featuring the original score for the documentary film.
